maltcms.tools
Class PathTools

java.lang.Object
  maltcms.tools.PathTools
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfigurable
public class PathTools
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigurable

Utility class providing methods for handling of the path obtained from alignment.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de

                                          IFileFragment ref,
                                          IFileFragment target)
Calculates a trace based on the int[][] argument. Expects 0 for diagonal steps, 1 for vertical steps and -1 for horizontal steps.
